categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Red Four" was an individual and a pilot that flew under the callsign Red Four during the Galactic Civil War. The pilot was a member of Red Flight, a starfighter squadron in the service of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. "Red Four" was a rookie pilot at the time Red Flight deployed to assist Extraction Team Bravo.

Red Four is the player character appeared in the 2016 Star Wars Battlefront: Rogue One: X-wing VR Mission, a downloadable virtual reality add-on to the 2015 canon video game Star Wars Battlefront.. Players have the option of taking a male or female pilot.
